name: Madison Finn Quiz / Test | Kid Lit Authors A - K | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Madison's online pal?
questions.explanation:
Bigwheels.

	Madison's online name is MadFinn.

questions.text: What is the name of Madison's enemy?
questions.explanation:
Ivy Daly.

	Madison's nickname for Ivy is Poison Ivy.

questions.text: What are the first names of Ivy's friends?
questions.explanation:
Rose and Joanie.

	Madison's nickname for Rose is Rose Thorn.  Madison's nickname for Joan is Phony Joanie.

questions.text: What are the first name of Madison's best friends?
questions.explanation:
Aimee and Fiona.

	Fiona plays soccer and Aimee is a dancer.

questions.text: What is the first name of Egg's sister?
What is the name of Madison's crush?
questions.explanation:
Hart Jones.

	Ivy also has a crush on Hart.

questions.text: What is the name of Madison's dad's girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Stephanie.

	Madison doesn't really like Stephanie.

questions.text: What is the name of Madison's dog?
What is the name of Aimee's dog?
questions.explanation:
Blossom.

	Aimee and Madison got their dogs at the same animal shelter.

questions.text: What is the first name of Fiona's brother?
questions.explanation:
Chet.

	Chet's online name is Wetwins.
